Do you want to learn the basics of machine learning in R and why it's useful? Before the help session this month at UQRUG, [Raimundo Sanchez](https://github.com/raimun2) will be providing an overview of supervised machine learning using the [tidymodels](https://www.tidymodels.org/) framework in R.

<p float="left">

<img src="https://uqrug.netlify.app/uqrug.png" height="100" style="margin-right:-0.2em;"/> <img src="tidymodels.svg" height="100" style="margin-right:-0.2em;"/>

</p>

**When** Wednesday 25th October, 12 - 2pm

**Where** St Lucia, Duhig North Central Library (12), Training room **12-N109**, and on Zoom

Sign up to the next event on the [Library training page](https://studenthub.uq.edu.au/students/events/detail/4796121)

For more information, reach out to the UQ Library training team for more help: <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="copyEvent('copy')" id="copy" title="Click to copy email address">training\@library.uq.edu.au</a>
